text: Sign up for WVU Tech Alert
WVU can send urgent news to your phone & email inbox.
Once you sign up for the service, powered by e2Campus, you can receive texts to your cell phone and/or emails with timely emergency information.
Students are automatically registered for WVU Tech Alert. Learn how to update your account or report a missed alert.
Students can add an additional email address or cell phone number to their WVU Tech Alert account - it's perfect for keeping parents and guardians in the loop.
Faculty and Staff can register to receive WVU Tech Alerts. Learn how to register and login to your e2Campus account.

Our focus is the safety and well-being of our Golden Bear family. Step one? Sign up for Tech Alert and receive emergency messages when you need them most.
Here, it's safety first. These are some resources you can use to stay safe and ahead of the game in an emergency.

Sign up for LiveSafe and you'll have a wide range of safety resources at your fingertips.   Report suspicious activity directly to the police or have a friend or family   member digitally "walk" you home.
Tips and resources for preventing crime, protecting your valuables and reporting criminal activity, plus crime statistics and reports. It's all here to help you stay safe and in the know.
If you are concerned about the actions/behaviors of a member of the WVU Tech   Campus community, please use the following form to let the Threat Assessment Committee   know.

This is where our next wave of leaders is learning to run our businesses, heal our communities and preserve our history.
Fast-growing and fascinating programs for every type of student.

From criminal justice and forensic investigation to programs that will teach you to lead in business, healthcare and public service, we have the major that will help you land a career in some of the country's most in-demand fields.
Many of our programs require experiential training - like internships and co-ops - plus we offer opportunities for service learning.
Our students are active in  a wide range of organizations. From Greek life, competitive gaming and hobby organizations to professional groups, there's something for everyone.
